title: IBM security advisory (AV25-236)
description: Between April 21 and 27, 2025, IBM published security advisories to address vulnerabilities in multiple products. Included were critical updates for the following products:
products: IBM Power HMC V10.2.1030.0  version V10.2.1030.0
IBM Power HMC V10.3.1050.0  version V10.3.1050.0
IBM QRadar SIEM  version 7.5 to 7.5.0 UP11 IF03
IBM webMethods Integration (on prem)  versions 10.11, 10.15 and 11.1
solution: Review the references and apply the necessary updates.
